name: Housing Authority of Hazard
description: The Housing Authority of Hazard is a public housing authority that provides affordable housing assistance to low-income families, elderly, and disabled individuals in Hazard, Kentucky and surrounding Perry County area. The authority administers public housing units and Section 8 Housing Choice Voucher programs. Services include rental assistance, housing placement, and property management for affordable housing units.
source: Verified from HUD documentation and official contact information
services: Public Housing, Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers, Low-Income Housing Assistance, Rental Assistance Programs, Housing Placement Services
eligibility: Low-income families, elderly, and disabled individuals meeting HUD income guidelines
fees: Based on income - typically 30% of adjusted gross income for rent
notes: Executive Director: I. H. Buchanan, III. Board Chairperson: Nan Gorman. The authority serves Perry County and surrounding areas. Contact for application information and waiting list status.
